images.description: Three for good luck, I suppose

conversation.name: Lily
conversation.label: Client
conversation.content: I don't really like the size of this heading. Can you guys try to figure something else out?

conversation.name: Madeline
conversation.label: Designer
conversation.content: Sure thing, Lily! We can make it larger, so more attention is drawn to it.

lessonContent.task: Make the header font a little larger.

hints.title: Find the correct element to target.

lessonContent.endText: Here's some text to sum the ending piece up.

conversation.name: Lily
conversation.label: Client
conversation.content: The menu looks a bit funny, can it be fixed somehow?

conversation.name: Madeline
conversation.label: Designer
conversation.content: I know what you mean, it looks like there's some issues with spacing. We can make it so there's more space between the items and even add some other touches.

lessonContent.task: Add some spacing between each item and differentiate the menu item names from the descriptions and prices.
lessonContent.endText: Here's some text to sum the ending piece up.

conversation.name: Lily
conversation.label: Client
conversation.content: I'm not sure I like how the menu has items one-by-one. Is it possible for you to go and fix that? Maybe the items are side by side?

conversation.name: Madeline
conversation.label: Designer
conversation.content: Sure, how does this design look?

conversation.name: Lily
conversation.label: Client
conversation.content: Hmmmm, I think that's nice. Is it possible to see it in action?

conversation.name: Madeline
conversation.label: Designer
conversation.content: Yes, we can get that done.

lessonContent.task: Change the menu so it has two columns.
lessonContent.endText: Here's some text to sum the ending piece up.

conversation.name: Lily
conversation.label: Client
conversation.content: I love the design you did, Madeline! I can't wait to see the website working!

conversation.name: Madeline
conversation.label: Designer
conversation.content: I'm glad you're excited, we certainly are too! Since the design is done, we'll head into development now.

lessonContent.task: Create a website from the PDF provided.
lessonContent.endText: Here's some text to sum the ending piece up.

conversation.name: Lily
conversation.label: Client
conversation.content: Thanks so much for helping me out! I can't believe I found someone who can make the whole website. I sent you some more details about my business, hopefully that's enough for you to go off of?

lessonContent.task: Design and develop a website for the client.
lessonContent.endText: Here's some text to sum the ending piece up.
